text: @krishgm @BBCr4today Even if you put aside the Coronavirus story, what organisation would continue to employ someone who has lied in telling a factual story. Organisations operate on trust and honesty, once that is gone they disappear e.g. NOTW. Time for chairman of @spectator to step up to the mark.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
